section.name: Unit 4 Awareness Building: The Many Forms of Bias
section.summary:
This unit will provide an overview of the various forms of bias and how they affect students and programs. By the end of this section, you will be able to:

  • Examine the ways bias can appear in adult education.
  • Reflect on the way individual bias affects students or programs.
  • Articulate an action step to ensure that bias is not affecting your work or program.

After you have completed the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin Unit 5, “Taking Action: Equity Audit.”
